description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.XrBOn1MueVB4u5sV]{Nanocyte Knack}

You can concentrate your nanites into a smaller area to increase the concealment granted by your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.KOxmSWm5D1jHy8VU]{Cloud Array (Ex)}. You can reduce the size of your cloud array by a number of squares up to your Constitution modifier and increase the miss chance granted by your cloud array by 5% per square reduced, to a maximum miss chance of 50%.

SFS Note: Add the following text to the Concentrated Cloud nanocyte knack: “You can do this automatically when you form your cloud array or reconfigure your cloud array. Your cloud array must already be granting concealment to reconfigure into a concentrated cloud.”
